name: SUPER HuCARD
overview: Super HuCard is a project from Benjamin Quinn, with Audio fixes by Van Rijn. It initially consisted of 60 HuCards on a single CDRom, in 2003. For it's first public release, in 2003-08-27, about 75 games works. The current release supports 115 games on a single CDRom. PCEWorks later released a (bootleg?) pressed image of an 80 game version of this CD.
